alert.note: Alert for Burleigh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 04 at 10:09PM CDT until September 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR WELLS...SOUTHEASTERN SHERIDAN...KIDDER...EASTERN BURLEIGH... FOSTER AND STUTSMAN COUNTIES... At 1008 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Goodrich to 5 miles east of Fessenden to 6 miles south of Carrington to 5 miles northwest of Cleveland, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Carrington, Fessenden and Bordulac around 1015 PM CDT. Pingree around 1025 PM CDT. Grace City around 1035 PM CDT. Kensal around 1045 PM CDT. Mchenry around 1105 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Eldridge, Juanita, Manfred, Driscoll, Chase Lake, Windsor, Bowdon, Wellsburg, Barlow and Arena. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
